name: Autumn
headline: Build any pricing model in a few lines of code
description: Autumn is an open-source layer over Stripe that handles any pricing model in a few lines of code.

founders.name: Ayush Rodrigues, Founder
founders.description: Previously a PM at a London-based payment company called Checkout.com.

founders.name: John Yeo, Founder
founders.description: I've been building software for 6 years now, and before Recase, built a low-code platform to help devs speed up backend development. Studied computer engineering at Imperial College London.

### Build your pricing in minutes
### Build your pricing in minutes
### Build any pricing modelin minutes
An open-source layer over Stripe to create any pricing model, and embed it into your application with a few lines of code. 
[Get Started](https://useautumn.com/<https:/app.useautumn.com>)
[Get Started](https://useautumn.com/<https:/app.useautumn.com>)
[Get Started](https://useautumn.com/<https:/app.useautumn.com>)
[Chat with us?](https://useautumn.com/<https:/cal.com/ayrod>)
[Chat with us?](https://useautumn.com/<https:/cal.com/ayrod>)
[Chat with us?](https://useautumn.com/<https:/cal.com/ayrod>)
### How it works
### How it works
###### 1
###### Define a pricing model
Build your pricing model in Autumn, by defining how users should be charged and what features they get access to.
###### 1
###### Define a pricing model
Build your pricing model in Autumn, by defining how users should be charged and what features they get access to.
###### 1
###### Define a pricing model
Build your pricing model in Autumn, by defining how users should be charged and what features they get access to.
###### 2
###### attachProduct()
When a user purchases a product, Autumn returns a Stripe Checkout URL and stores subscription status.
###### 2
###### attachProduct()
When a user purchases a product, Autumn returns a Stripe Checkout URL and stores subscription status.
###### 2
###### attachProduct()
When a user purchases a product, Autumn returns a Stripe Checkout URL and stores subscription status.
###### 3
###### checkEntitled()
When a user tries to access a feature, Autumn will tell you if they're allowed based on the pricing model you defined.
###### 3
###### checkEntitled()
When a user tries to access a feature, Autumn will tell you if they're allowed based on the pricing model you defined.
###### 3
###### checkEntitled()
When a user tries to access a feature, Autumn will tell you if they're allowed based on the pricing model you defined.
###### 1
###### Define a pricing model
Build your pricing model in Autumn, by defining how users should be charged and what features they get access to.
###### 2
###### attachProduct()
When a user purchases a product, Autumn returns a Stripe Checkout URL and stores subscription status.
###### 3
###### checkEntitled()
When a user tries to access a feature, Autumn will tell you if they're allowed based on the pricing model you defined.
##### For the new age of software
Today, there are more ways than ever to monetize software. Your customers want flexible pricing, but it's a nightmare to build, prone to breaking and expensive to maintain.
Autumn handles all the complexity of pricing and billing out-of-the-box, so you can focus on building what matters.
### Reliable billing with just a few lines of code
### Reliable billing with just a few lines of code
Forget managing webhooks, subscription states, and Stripe IDs. Call one endpoint and redirect your customer to a Stripe Checkout page. Autumn tracks what your users can access.
Forget managing webhooks, subscription states, and Stripe IDs. Call one endpoint and redirect your customer to a Stripe Checkout page. Autumn tracks what your users can access.

### Ship any pricing model and iterate without engineering
### Ship any pricing model and iterate without engineering
Subscriptions, add-ons, credits or usage-based pricing—you can build whatever you want in Autumn. Make changes and experiment with new pricing from our UI. No dev work needed.
Subscriptions, add-ons, credits or usage-based pricing—you can build whatever you want in Autumn. Make changes and experiment with new pricing from our UI. No dev work needed.
### Track customer usage and create custom plans
### Track customer usage and create custom plans
Track usage of features in real-time and enforce limits—just send Autumn usage events via API. Create custom plans and limits for special customers. 
Track usage of features in real-time and enforce limits—just send Autumn usage events via API. Create custom plans and limits for special customers.

“Literally cannot imagine going without it. Thank you. 
I had some pretty crazy usage-based limitations for different features, as well as a free trial, and had some bad edge cases that were causing issues every week for my users. 
With Autumn I don’t have to think about it anymore. 
**It’s godsent.** ”
Daniel Edrisian|Founder

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Autumn**

Autumn is a startup that launched in 2024 as part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, geared towards simplifying the way businesses handle pricing models. With just a team of two, Autumn has a clear mission: to let developers build any pricing model within a couple of lines of code. This concept stems from its foundation as an open-source layer over Stripe, designed to tackle the complexities of pricing and billing.

**What It Does:**
At its core, Autumn helps businesses create customizable billing solutions effortlessly. Users can define pricing models for subscriptions, usage, add-ons, and more, all without heavy engineering overhead. The key selling point? With Autumn, you can embed a complete pricing solution into your application swiftly. Just define how users are charged, connect products to Stripe, and Autumn handles the rest—tracking subscriptions and entitlement checks seamlessly.

**Why It Matters:**
In today's competitive landscape, companies need flexibility in their pricing strategies, but traditional methods can be cumbersome and prone to errors. Autumn addresses this by reducing development time and assembling a product that allows for quick iterations and easier updates to pricing models. It removes the headaches associated with managing customer subscriptions and integrations, allowing developers to focus on building features rather than infrastructure.

**Funding and Support:**
Autumn is backed by notable investors, including Khosla Ventures and Kleiner Perkins, providing it with the necessary resources to continue developing its platform.

**Team:**
The company is based in an undisclosed location, with a compact team of two, led by Group Partner Pete Koomen.

**Conclusion:**
If you're a developer or a startup looking to streamline your billing efforts, Autumn positions itself as a powerful ally. By leveraging existing systems like Stripe and coupling them with user-friendly code interfaces, Autumn proves to be a practical solution for modern software monetization challenges. In a world where engineering time is precious, few tools can compete with the simplicity and effectiveness of Autumn's model.
  
For more information or to get started, visit their website at [useautumn.com](https://useautumn.com).
